description: Schema for milestone reports generated by the milestone skill

sections.content: String. Concise summary of work done (1-3 sentences). MUST be in Simplified Chinese.
List. Key architectural choices. Format: Decision | Reason. MUST be in Simplified Chinese.

fields.Ripple Effects: Upstream dependencies and downstream consumers affected.
fields.Code Logic: Explanation of specific logic changes (Line X-Y).

sections.content: Analyze impact on: Data Flow, Functional Hierarchy, Framework Impact, API Consistency, Performance (Time/Space), Concurrency/Locks, Hardcoding/Config.
String/List. Test results, logs, or RCA. MUST be in Simplified Chinese.
List. Property-Based Testing invariants. MUST be in Simplified Chinese.
List. Remaining tasks and known risks. MUST be in Simplified Chinese.
